body: Extended trips, when travelling companions are living in each others’ pockets for months on end, are often intense experiences that can make or break friendships and relationships.  We want to hear your stories of travelling fall outs. Have you had a major barney with your travel companion on a long trip? Ended up going your separate ways three weeks into a gap year? Or did a group trip end up – for one or more parties – as a solo journey? We want all the juicy details! Tell us what happened and how you dealt with it: did it mark the beginning of a new adventure ... or was it simply awful? Please share your stories by filling in our form below.
webTitle: Tell us about your travellers' tiffs
